FuncDef: The reset erps statistics command clears packet statistics in an ERPS ring. The reset erps statistics command clears packet statistics in an ERPS ring. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears packet statistics in a specific ERPS ring.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 255.
